description.narrative: 2.1.1 Government ensures*, especially for out-of-school girls and most disadvantaged adolescents, increased access to and completion of secondary education.*based on evidence on barriers to participation in secondary education, which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Adolescent Development, Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development, Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Education â€“ General, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Equity â€“ Focus On Girls' And Inclusive Education, Learning And Child-Friendly Schools. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Youth Empowerment and Protection
